releaseNotes:
- Introduced multiple new content providers to expand movie and series availability, and many more...

Team Netra

changelog.text: TV UI/UX design has been completely overhauled for a more modern, smooth, and user-friendly viewing experience.
Resolved Android TV remote D-Pad navigation issues to ensure accurate and responsive focus movement.
Fixed pinch-to-zoom gesture handling and added a dedicated setting to enable or disable zoom functionality.
Improved and corrected provider extraction logic for better compatibility and faster content loading.

lockMessage: The app is temporarily locked for maintenance. Please check back later.
